#id=1
#text=Yesterday I was riding around my neighborhood on my bicycle when I drove over a rusty nail hiding between the bricks on the sidewalk .
#id=2
#text=I had to walk my bike home .
#id=3
#text=Today , I went to the store to buy a flat tire repair kit .
#id=4
#text=I took the tire off the bike and located the nail so I could remove it .
#id=5
#text=After removing the nail , I let the remainder of the air out of the tire .
#id=6
#text=The next step was to pry the tire off of the rim .
#id=7
#text=I got my flat head screwdriver and was able to separate the rim from the tire and inner tube .
#id=8
#text=I pumped just enough air to find the leak in my tire where the nail had penetrated .
#id=9
#text=After finding the hole , I buffed the area the hole was at and applied glue to it .
#text=Then I put a tire patch over the glue and let it sit for a few minutes .
#text=I put the inner tube and tire back on the rim , and pumped my tire up with air .
